snippet.title: Dungeon Golf | First Look Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your clubs ready as Dungeon Golf is open (on the 26th of April 2023) for public playtesting! 🎮

Chuck us on your Wishlist and join the playtest here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2144040/Dungeon_Golf/

Tee up and prepare to dominate your friends (and CPU opponents) in couch multiplayer while navigating treacherous terrain and menacing monsters. Harness outrageous abilities to turn the tide on your foes and become the GUDGOAT (Greatest Ultimate Dungeon Golfer of All Time).

About Dungeon Golf ⛳

Dungeon Golf is a physics-based mini-golf party game. Compete with your friends in online and local multiplayer or play solo to win trophies and climb to the top. Whack balls, battle enemies and get the upper hand with your abilities to change the odds. May The Fores Be With You!

We really appreciate you playing Dungeon Golf and would love to hear your feedback so come on over to our discord channel and let us know what you think! https://discord.com/invite/AntWorkshop

- The Ants 🐜
